Module com.github.sormuras.bach

Package com.github.sormuras.bach.project

package com.github.sormuras.bach.project
Provides the classes and interfaces used as components of Bach's project model.

Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in any class or interface in this package will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Space
    A nominal space for modular Java source code.

    A record of well-known directories.

    MainSpace
    A code space for main modules.

    A map of module declarations using their names as keys.

    A launcher command configuration used by jlink.

    A module-path record.
    Settings
    Fundamental project properties.

    A source or resource directory potentially targeting a specific Java SE release.
    SourceFolders
    A list of source folder objects.
    Spaces
    A record of code spaces and code related properties.
    TestSpace
    A code space for test modules.
    Tools
    Tool-related settings.
    Tweak
    An additional list of arguments for a given trigger, usually a tool's name.
    Tweaks
    A list of tweaks.
